name: AiFlow
headline: AI-Based Candidate Identification for the C-Suite
description: AiFlow Powers Executive Search and Board Advisory at the Speed of AI. In today's competitive landscape, quickly delivering exceptional candidates is essential for building long term partnerships with clients. AiFlow empowers your firm to exceed expectations through the power of artificial intelligence. Our AI possesses unparalleled insights into C-level and board candidates, enabling search firms to deliver the absolute highest quality candidates at unprecedented speeds.

founders.name: Nicholas Manske, Founder
founders.description: Nick Manske is the CEO & co-founder of AiFlow, a specialized CRM platform designed for executive recruiting firms. Prior to his role at AiFlow, Nick co-founded and served as CTO at Alariss Global, a VC-backed startup using NLP to match overseas SaaS companies with American salespeople. Prior to startup life, Nick served as a U.S. diplomat in technology & economic affairs in three different countries. Nick did his studies at Harvard College and INSEAD.

founders.name: Josh Gardner, Founder
founders.description: Trained under one of the creators of OpenAI's GPT - the leading AI model today - Josh Gardner is a Princeton-educated computer scientist. Josh's research has been published in top journals and helped him secure a spot as an engineering leader at Alariss Global upon completing graduate school. At Alariss, Josh spearheaded the design and creation of a state of the art AI applicant tracking system, leading an 8 person engineering team. Josh's understanding of cutting edge AI research and experience

raw_markdown="[![AiFlow](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/static/media/aiflowHorizontalLogo.606285e8.webp)](https://aiflow.solutions/</>)
[About Us](https://aiflow.solutions/</#company>)[Privacy](https://aiflow.solutions/</privacy>)[Terms](https://aiflow.solutions/</terms>)[Contact](https://aiflow.solutions/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/josh-gardner>)
[Get started today](https://aiflow.solutions/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/josh-gardner>)
# All Private Equity Operators  In One Curated Database
## Instantly find PE-backed CEOs, CFOs, COOs, and other executives for rapid, reliable placements that power rapid, reliable returns.
[Schedule a Demo](https://aiflow.solutions/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/josh-gardner>)[Learn More](https://aiflow.solutions/<#features>)
Finding the right leadership can be the difference between a transformative exit and a stalled portfolio company. AiFlow gives you a database of top-tier executives who have already proven their ability to navigate the unique demands of PE-backed businesses.
![](https://aiflow.solutions/background-features.jpg)
## Find PE Operators Faster
No more painful back and forth between PitchBook and LinkedIn. AiFlow has aggregated all of the C-Level officers from leading private equity firms’ portfolio companies(both current and exited). Our system is specifically optimized EXCLUSIVELY for executive recruiters and uses cutting edge advancements in AI to make finding the right candidates lightning fast. We have the best data and search tools custom made for executive search.
### Proven Success in PE Settings
Exclusively C-level leaders who have thrived under the high pressures and rigorous performance goals set by private equity sponsors.
### Granular Filtering
Narrow your search by industry sector, functional expertise (CEO, CFO, COO, CRO, etc.), geographic location, deal size, and more.
### Real-Time Updates
Easily identify executives who are currently open to new roles, making it simpler to engage with the right candidates at the right time.
### Portfolio Insights
We track whose portfolios executives have been in and how long they were there.
Exclusively C-level leaders who have thrived under the high pressures and rigorous performance goals set by private equity sponsors.
![](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FObjectivity.5a4728dd.png&w=3840&q=75)
Narrow your search by industry sector, functional expertise (CEO, CFO, COO, CRO, etc.), geographic location, deal size, and more.
![](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FSpeed.30a3f9a9.png&w=3840&q=75)
Easily identify executives who are currently open to new roles, making it simpler to engage with the right candidates at the right time.
![](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FFocus.06aa40cb.png&w=3840&q=75)
We track whose portfolios executives have been in and how long they were there.
![](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FFocus.06aa40cb.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Bringing You The Best
AiFlow was developed alongside top executive recruiters and all of our data and workflows were optimized with executive recruiters in mind. We have the world’s premier database of private equity executives and have used AI to make it easy to find the right talent fast.
### Deep Intelligence
AiFlow understands companies and their needs faster than any human.
AiFlow instantly performs research and market mapping. What used to take you weeks, takes AiFlow seconds.
![](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FInsight3.a7b6b058.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Enterprise Grade Security 
AiFlow is SOC II Type 1 certified and adheres to strict security standards.
We have strong Data Protection Agreements with all of our AI vendors and do not use any customer data for training our proprietary models.
![](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FscreenshotSOC2Audit.74abcc03.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
### Highly Customizeable
We offer bespoke solutions for our enterpise clients.
AiFlow’s platform is highly customizable and we're glad to do custom integrations. Book a demo to learn more.
![](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FscreenshotDataIntegration.ad9e8853.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
### Deep Intelligence
AiFlow understands companies and their needs faster than any human.
AiFlow instantly performs research and market mapping. What used to take you weeks, takes AiFlow seconds.
### Enterprise Grade Security 
AiFlow is SOC II Type 1 certified and adheres to strict security standards.
We have strong Data Protection Agreements with all of our AI vendors and do not use any customer data for training our proprietary models.
### Highly Customizeable
We offer bespoke solutions for our enterpise clients.
AiFlow’s platform is highly customizable and we're glad to do custom integrations. Book a demo to learn more.
![](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FInsight3.a7b6b058.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FscreenshotSOC2Audit.74abcc03.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FscreenshotDataIntegration.ad9e8853.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://aiflow.solutions/background-call-to-action.jpg)
## Elevate Your Recruiting To The Next Level with AiFlow.
Never deal with the pain of jumping back and forth between LinkedIn and Pitchbook again. AiFlow instantly arms you with what you need to make the best hires. Contact us today to schedule a demo. 
[Book a Demo](https://aiflow.solutions/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/josh-gardner>)
## Built by Recruiting Experts
AiFlow was created by two expert technologists with deep understanding of executive search and the latest advances in AI.
![Nick Manske](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fnick_headshot.9bc5d74b.png&w=828&q=75)
### [Nick Manske](https://aiflow.solutions/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/nicholas-manske/>)
Co-Founder & CEO
Nick co-founded [Alariss Global](https://aiflow.solutions/<www.alariss.com>), a software platform for international candidate search focused on GTM leadership. At its peak, Alariss Global employed 37 people, and Nick directly built and managed a 12 person product and engineering team and helped oversee a 8 person candidate delivery team. Nick's experience as a cross-functional tech and search leader makes him uniquely qualified to build technology for the executive search industry. Nick was educated at Harvard College ('09) and INSEAD ('17J'), and previously served as U.S. diplomat in Asia, the Middle East, and Washington, D.C.
[LinkedIn](https://aiflow.solutions/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/nicholas-manske/>)
![Josh Gardner](https://aiflow.solutions/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fjosh_headshot.74f76fd1.png&w=828&q=75)
### [Josh Gardner](https://aiflow.solutions/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/josh-gardner-957903134/>)
Co-Founder & CTO
Josh Gardner is a Princeton-educated computer scientist with research published in top journals. His expertise in artificial intelligence and natural language processing helped him secure a spot as an engineering leader at [Alariss Global](https://aiflow.solutions/<www.alariss.com>) upon completing graduate school. At Alariss, Josh spearheaded the design and creation of a state of the art AI applicant tracking system, leading an 8 person engineering team. Josh's understanding of cutting edge AI research and experience building tools for talent professionals enables him to bring the latest AI breakthroughs to search.
[LinkedIn](https://aiflow.solutions/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/josh-gardner-957903134/>)
# Backed by

generated_description:
**AiFlow: Revolutionizing Executive Search with AI**

Founded in 2022 and based in the heart of San Francisco, AiFlow is a startup that’s taking the complexities out of executive recruitment—especially for C-suite positions—through the power of artificial intelligence. Initially launched as AiFlow Powers Executive Search and Board Advisory, the company quickly recognized that speed and quality in candidate identification are crucial in today’s competitive landscape.

### Why AiFlow Matters
At its core, AiFlow is on a mission to provide AI-based candidate identification specifically tailored for the C-Suite. With an emphasis on private equity-supported firms, the platform aggregates data on top executives from successful businesses, from CEOs to CFOs, allowing recruitment firms to exceed client expectations like never before.

The company operates with a small but mighty team of just two employees, co-founders Nick Manske and Josh Gardner, both of whom bring deep expertise in technology and executive search. They’ve created an environment where AI performs research and market mapping with a speed and accuracy that outpaces manual methods.

### Key Features
- **Curated Database**: AiFlow offers a compilation of CEOs, CFOs, and executives from leading private equity firms, equipped with functionality to narrow search results by various criteria such as industry, location, and specific roles.
- **Real-Time Updates**: Recruiters can quickly identify executives who are currently open to new roles, facilitating timely engagements.
- **Granular Filtering**: The platform allows for focused searches based on deal size and functional expertise, ensuring users find the right fit without sifting through unqualified candidates.
- **Deep Intelligence**: With the ability to analyze and interpret vast amounts of data, AiFlow can inform recruiters about executive backgrounds and suitability faster than any human effort.

### Security and Customization
Trust is paramount in executive search. AiFlow is SOC II Type 1 certified and implements robust data protection measures, ensuring all client information remains secure. Plus, the platform is highly customizable to meet the enterprise needs of its clients, ensuring tailored solutions that fit specific requirements.

### Built by Experts
The founding team includes:
- **Nick Manske** (Co-Founder & CEO): An experienced technologist with a background in international executive search platforms, Nick has a history of building and managing tech teams effectively.
- **Josh Gardner** (Co-Founder & CTO): A Princeton-educated specialist in AI and machine learning, Josh has previously led engineering teams in developing cutting-edge recruitment technologies.

### Backed by Y Combinator
AiFlow is part of Y Combinator’s Batch W23, providing it with additional mentorship and support from one of the most prestigious startup accelerators in the world.

In summary, AiFlow is tackling the age-old pain point of finding and engaging high-quality executive talent with an innovative, data-driven approach. If you're looking to elevate your recruiting processes, this platform might just be the game changer you've been waiting for.

For more information, visit [AiFlow](https://aiflow.solutions).
